column4: I have configured a few programs to load at startup like gnome-do and dropbox but none of the load at start up
how did you set it up?
what did you add exactly?
what commands?  Can you please use my nick if you are answering my question?
gnome-do for Gnome Do
check ~/.xsession-errors
What am i looking for in the file ?
anything interesting (and related to gnome-do)
Missing method Do.Pl
does typing "gnome-do" in a terminal work for you now?  Make sure you close it first
It does run but I get a [Error 16:50:08.273] Error in RunOnMainThread: Method not found: 'Do.Platform.AbstractApplicationService.RunOnThread'.
how about the other app you were trying to make startup automaticaly?
It just aborted on its own right now.
Dropbox works fine from the terminal no errors there.
well try giving an absolute path at the start-up setup
If i was to remove a specific application completely with configuration files. How would I go about
aptitude purge PACKAGE
if you want to also remove user settings you need to delete those on your own
Oh k thanks
better in what sense?
I am still tryin to gather the difference between aptitude and apt-get, I have googled it a bit but still not sure.
so as to which is better
they are just different front-ends to APT.  aptitude is better
Thanks a lot buddy Cheers.
